description: Using TuxGuitar: Use no spaces to divide syllables. Use a dash between syllables instead (i.e. "Ti-ger").  Other notes: all underscores are ignored by Songsterr. Line breaks in the TuxGuitar lyrics editor act as spaces to Songsterr. Double spaces skip a note in both programs.
title: Lyrics Test

description: Using TuxGuitar: If you put a dash to divide syllables (i.e. "Ti-ger") the words will work correctly in Songsterr. The dash basically instructs the tab to go to the next note. So, writing "Ti- ger" with a space after the dash will add an extra space that should not belong.
title: Lyrics Test

description: removed the dashes dividing syllables; this should fix it but not look good
title: Lyrics Test

description: this should put syllables in the lyrics
title: Lyrics Test
